item.title: End of Life Care
item.description: Linux4Jamaica recognizes that all computers will one day be broken beyond repair. While we promote repair to extend the life of laptops, we also understand the importance of safe disposal practices. Electronics contain a wide variety of hazardous substances – even small amounts of these toxics can be dangerous if released into the air, water and soil. Proper disposal of electronics protects our health and environment by keeping these substances out of our landfills and incinerators. Improper disposal of e-waste poses a significant threat to the environment and human health, which is why it’s essential to dispose of electronic materials at a specialty waste center. We have a responsibility to preserve the natural beauty of Jamaica by promoting safe disposal practices.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Thank you for your interest! Please use this form to get in contact with our team.

An email address is required.

item.title: Our Team
item.description:
Joan Dao, Business Supervisor

Joan is an American tech entrepreneur with a diverse background in fashion, tech, and bio-science industries. She currently serves as the CEO of Ilesovi Inc, a company that specializes in creating high-end security IoT fashion devices. Joan is a firm believer in the power of tech-powered ingenuity, and she is living proof that innovation and creativity come from collaboration of seemingly unrelated interests. She holds a Bachelor's of Science degree in Neuroscience from the University of Minnesota, Twin Cities, located in Minneapolis, Minnesota.
